select `q`.`no` AS `no`,`q`.`context` AS `context`,`q`.`context_key` AS `contextKey`,`q`.`context_after` AS `contextAfter`, `q`.`a` AS `a`,`q`.`b` AS `b`,`q`.`c` AS `c`,`q`.`d` AS `d`,`q`.`answer` AS `answer`,`q`.`analysis` AS `analysis`,`q`.`delete_flag` AS `deleteFlag`,`q`.`source` AS `source`, q.classify_id AS classifyId, q.structure_id AS structureId, q.father_id as fatherId, `d`.`exam` AS `exam`,`d`.`exam_type` AS `examType`, `d`.`jlpt_level` AS `jlptLevel`,`d`.`jtest_level` AS `jtestLevel` from tb_question_classify d, (select * from tb_question where no not in (select question_id from tb_collection where id=#{userId})) q where q.classify_id=d.id and q.delete_flag = '0'
and (d.jtest_level=#{jtestLevel,jdbcType=CHAR} or d.jlpt_level=#{jlptLevel,jdbcType=CHAR})
limit 5
